import React, {useState} from 'react' function ConsonantForm(props) { const [symbol, setSymbol] = useState("") const [easyType, setEasyType] = useState("") const handleSymbolChange = (event) => { setSymbol(event.target.value) } const handleEasyTypeChange = (event) => { setEasyType(event.target.value) } return (
); } export default ConsonantForm;
